comments: Turner (IND) beats Herro (MIA) to the spot and absorbs the contact to his front during the drive.
Herro (MIA) leaves his feet to pass and he releases the ball prior to returning to the floor.
Sabonis (IND) is already in Herro's (MIA) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Robinson (MIA) turns slightly towards Brogdon's (IND) path and marginal contact occurs as Brogdon maintains his desired path.
Adebayo (MIA) is drawn into the air and makes contact to Turner's (IND) front and affects his SQBR and ability to maintain control of the ball.
Turner (IND) legally saves the ball back in bounds before his left hand touches out of bounds.
McDermott (IND) is moving alongside Butler's (MIA) path and maintains a legal guarding position on the perimeter.
LeVert (IND) legally contests Adebayo's (MIA) shot near the rim.
Robinson (MIA) extends his arm into Turner's (IND) path and impedes his FOM off ball.
Adebayo (MIA) legally contests LeVert's (IND) driving shot attempt.
Iguodala (MIA) is already in LeVert's (IND) path when contact occurs and he releases away from the contact.
LeVert (IND) makes marginal contact to Butler's (MIA) side as he slightly extends his arm and loses control of the ball as it deflects off of his knee.
Butler (MIA) does not bring part of his hand under the ball when he brings his dribble to a pause.
Butler (MIA) is already in McDermott's (IND) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Adebayo (MIA) places his hand momentarily on Sabonis' (IND) hip and contact is marginal.
Sabonis (IND) establishes a screening position outside of Iguodala's (MIA) field of view and he gives him a step to avoid the contact.
Sabonis (IND) commits a take foul on Adebayo (MIA).
Brogdon (IND) does not inbound the ball within five seconds.
Butler (MIA) makes clean contact with the ball as he defends Sabonis (IND) on the perimeter.
Herro (MIA) legally contests Turner's (IND) jump shot attempt.
Brogdon (IND) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA).
